name: BeraFi
description: BeraFi is a DeFi platform built on Berachain, designed to simplify trading and asset management through account abstraction, social logins, and gas-sponsored transactions. It aggregates liquidity across Berachain DEXes to ensure optimal pricing and enables batch transactions, allowing users to swap multiple tokens in a single step. By removing traditional wallet setup requirements and streamlining approvals, BeraFi enhances accessibility and security. The platformâ€™s automation reduces the need for manual interactions, making DeFi as intuitive as Web2 applications. BeraFi also introduces the $BERAFI token, which supports governance, liquidity incentives, and a buyback mechanism to sustain ecosystem growth.
